special_text:
[+2]: Create two 2/2 white Soldier creature tokens in your reserves. [i]({3}: Put up to three tokens from your reserves onto the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
[-1]: You may put any number of tokens from your reserves onto the battlefield.  For each token put onto the battlefield this way, draw a card.
[-7]: Create two white enchantment tokens named Intisuyu’s Armies with “At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 white Soldier creature token for each creature you control.”
